title: Relic shiield changes and Thresh
body:
Just wondering does thresh have an exception to the new ranged relic shield rules.... I'm noticing Thresh is slightly killed atm and wondering if Riot has thought of this.

Thank you.

replies.body: Thresh isn't meta partly because of the relic shield changes nerfing the lane sustain, making it not as gold efficient (for him) and the alternative coin makes him so squishy he can't stand up long in engages, let alone team fights.

Relic is still my choice to take on thresh, its just that thresh isn't very meta at the moment. If you're good at him though it's not really a problem. Just make sure you get your e first when you have relic so you can farm with it properly.

Just take coin on thresh.

But he has always been ranged for Relic shield.
